text:
Morning Klaudia, sorry was quite busy yesterday evening so didn't get to do much of an introduction. 

I'm a compositor at Framestore, currently working on Dr Dolittle and from Monday the next Bond movie. I was previously in paint and roto at Framestore and developed in to a lead and eventually progressed in to comp. 

What are you doing at the minute, at University I assume?

Is there anything in particular you're looking to get out of the mentorship scheme?
